body:
Hey there kids, Vladio here at your service.

Earlier today I was hearing a bunch in a skype group and in game that the policy about swearing is allowed but is not allowed if used excessively or towards someone has changed once again to a zero tolerance and was also told in game from three or four (maybe more, not 100% the exact number as I don't count this stuff) different staff members that it's a zero tolerance policy and others said that it is only for excessive and towards someone that you get punished for it.

The reason why I'm posting a thread about it and not contacting a Sr Mod/Admin about it is that there are more people than just me who are still confused on this subject and was wondering if it could be clarified so that there is no more confusion.

Thanks again people from the Avicush Community!
Love you all so vury much :)
~VLAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAD
